ja267:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja267:1.3_0: So overcome by the farming of the mark,
ja267:1.4_0: May they not harm me! May they not be harmed by me!”
ja267:2.1_0: “No, sir, I’ll never betray to you,
ja267:2.4_0: You Suppiya, too, are my daughter!”
ja267:3.1_0: “Those from the ocean, in the ocean,
ja267:3.3_0: You are the best of men,
ja267:3.4_0: free of go, they cry out.”
